price: 77. Alle baana iska leh waxaan muuqan ee jira samooyinka iyo arlada. Arrinka Saacadda (Qiyaamana) ma aha waxaan ahayn sida il biriqsi, ama ka dhowba. Hubaal Alle wax walba wuu Karaa.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَآ أَمۡرُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ إِلَّا كَلَمۡحِ ٱلۡبَصَرِ أَوۡ هُوَ أَقۡرَبُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walillahi ghaybu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā amru al-sāʿati illā kalamḥi al-baṣari aw huwa aqrabu inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
